statements: SELECT * FROM training_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_programs;
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM training_programs WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT program_id, program_name FROM training_programs WHERE program_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT program_name, end_date, start_date FROM training_programs ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM training_programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, start_date FROM training_programs WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT program_id, program_name, program_description FROM training_programs ORDER BY program_id DESC;
SELECT program_name FROM training_programs WHERE program_description LIKE '%skills%';
SELECT * FROM training_programs WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM training_programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_programs WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, end_date FROM training_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_participation WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT program_id, participation_date FROM employee_participation WHERE completion_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM training_programs WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_programs WHERE program_id = 3;
SELECT program_id, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_participants FROM employee_participation GROUP BY program_id HAVING total_participants > 10;

SELECT program_name, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_completed FROM training_programs tp JOIN employee_participation ep ON tp.program_id = ep.program_id WHERE ep.completion_status = TRUE GROUP BY program_name;
SELECT * FROM employee_participation WHERE participation_id IN (SELECT MAX(participation_id) FROM employee_participation);
SELECT program_name, start_date, duration_hours FROM training_programs;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT program_name, end_date FROM training_programs WHERE duration_hours > 10;
SELECT employee_name, program_name, completion_status FROM employees JOIN employee_programs ON employees.employee_id = employee_programs.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM training_programs;
SELECT program_id, program_name, duration_hours FROM training_programs WHERE duration_hours > 50;
SELECT employee_id, program_id FROM employee_programs WHERE completion_status = TRUE ORDER BY participation_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department, position FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_programs WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_programs ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, program_name, completion_status FROM employees JOIN employee_participation ON employees.employee_id = employee_participation.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM completion_certificates WHERE completion_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM training_programs WHERE program_id = 1;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM training_programs WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT employee_name, program_name, participation_date FROM employees INNER JOIN employee_participation ON employees.employee_id = employee_participation.employee_id WHERE completion_status = true;

SELECT program_name, count(employee_id) AS participants_count FROM training_programs INNER JOIN employee_participation ON training_programs.program_id = employee_participation.program_id GROUP BY program_name HAVING participants_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM Training_Programs;
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM Training_Programs;
SELECT employee_name, program_name FROM Employees JOIN Training_Programs ON Employees.employee_id = Training_Programs.program_id;
SELECT program_id, COUNT(employee_id) AS enrollment_count FROM Employee_Training GROUP BY program_id;
SELECT program_id, session_date, session_time FROM Program_Schedule ORDER BY session_date DESC, session_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Training_Programs ORDER BY program_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, employee_department FROM Employees WHERE employee_department = 'HR';
SELECT program_name, start_date, end_date FROM Training_Programs WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';

SELECT employee_name, program_name FROM Employees E INNER JOIN Employee_Training ET ON E.employee_id = ET.employee_id INNER JOIN Training_Programs TP ON ET.program_id = TP.program_id WHERE E.employee_department = 'IT';
SELECT program_id, COUNT(employee_id) AS total_enrollments FROM Employee_Training GROUP BY program_id ORDER BY total_enrollments DESC;
